title: Zambia Defence University (Declaration) Order, 2018
content:
26thJanuary,2018 Statutory Instruments 15
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.3 OF2018
The Higher Education Act
(ActNo.4of 2013)
The Zambia Defence University (Declaration)
Order, 2018
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section fourteen of the
HigherEducationAct,2013,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. ThisOrdermaybecitedastheZambiaDefenceUniversity Title
(Declaration)Order,2018.
2. TheMilitaryTrainingEstablishmentofZambiaisdeclared Declaration
ZambiaDefenceUniversity. ofZambia
Defence
University
PROF. N. LUO,
LUSAKA Minister of Higher Education
22ndJanuary,2018
[MSTVT.52/2/15]
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
16 StatutoryInstruments 26thJanuary,2018
